document_data.mainbody: '''Halfling domain''' was a deity domain that granted divine spellcasters like [[cleric]]s with [[halfling]]-inspired [[spell]]s and powers.
document_data.Powers: They gained the ability to boost their climbing, jumping, and stealth once per day for 10 minutes.
document_data.Spells: Novice spellcasters were able to use the ''[[magic stone]]'', ''[[cat's grace]]'', and ''[[magic vestment]]'' spells. Clerics of some experience could cast ''[[freedom of movement]]'', ''[[mordenkainen's faithful hound]]'', and ''[[move earth]]''. Those that were masters of this domain had access to ''[[shadow walk]]'', ''[[word of recall]]'', and ''[[foresight]]''.
